original_text: Oholibamah gave birth to three sons: Jeush, Jalam and Korah. These were Esau's sons that were born in the land of Canaan.
korean_text: 오홀리바마는 여우스와 얄람과 고라를 낳았으니 이들은 에서의 아들들이요 가나안 땅에서 그에게 태어난 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: Oholibamah gave birth to three sons
that were born in the land of Canaan
